code: import"./App.css";import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[height,setHeight]=useState("");const[weight,setWeight]=useState("");const[result,setResult]=useState("");const handleInput=e=>{if(e.target.name==="height"){setHeight(e.target.value);}else{setWeight(e.target.value);}};const calculate=()=>{if(!height||!weight||height<=0||weight<=0){clear();alert("Please enter valid data");}else{const convertMeter=height/100;const bmi=weight/(convertMeter*convertMeter);setResult(bmi.toFixed(2));}};const handleKeyDown=e=>{if(e.key==="Enter"){calculate();}};const clear=()=>{setHeight("");setWeight("");setResult("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bmi-calculator",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"data",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"BMI Calculator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input_container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"height",children:"Height(cm):"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",id:"height",name:"height",className:"textbox",value:height,onChange:handleInput,onKeyDown:handleKeyDown}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"weight",children:"Weight(kg):"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",id:"weight",name:"weight",className:"textbox",value:weight,onChange:handleInput,onKeyDown:handleKeyDown})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"ok",onClick:calculate,onKeyDown:handleKeyDown,children:"Calculate BMI"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"clear",onClick:clear,children:"Clear"}),result!==""&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"result",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Your BMI is: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:result})," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["State: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:["  ",result<18.5?"Underweight":result<24.9?"Normal weight":result<29.9?"Overweight":"Obesity"]})," "]})]})]})]});}export default App;
